TopicTitle: Kerbals at War - The very first KSP War movie

Articles.Content: They need to add weapons to 0.17 lol.
Not going to happen, not even in 0.18 or 0.19, HarvesteR wants KSP to be a non-violent game, and is not likely to change his mind, but feel free to make weapon mods

Not going to happen, not even in 0.18 or 0.19, HarvesteR wants KSP to be a non-violent game, and is not likely to change his mind, but feel free to make weapon mods

Lol, I know, but I figured it'd be nice to do orbital space combat when online multiplayer comes out.
This is amazing, just seen it and was amazed by it. I know KSP is going to stay a non-violent game (which I actually prefer) but this is amazing.

I now see what you can truly do with KSP

PS awesome

PPS loved the music
And this video singlehandedly turned KSP into a space race game for me.
EPIC EPIC can you have the ships that you use for other ppl ive made a bomber i wanna do it
What mod is that?

Lol, I know, but I figured it'd be nice to do orbital space combat when online multiplayer comes out.

You shouldn't presume multiplayer is coming any time soon.

You'll be dissapointed.
.crafts? pwease? pwetty pwease?
I NEEDZ DA .CRAFT FILES. But really, that's pretty epic. Me, my bunnies and my kitties applaud you.
what was the gun that destroyed the boat, is it just a railgun or another mod?

alternate game title, Supreme Kermander

because really, the tanks and planes look a lot like cybran units from supreme commander
Dude that was AMAZING they should so add a war like base to kerbin were you can create your tanks and fight A.I !!!!
OH MY GOSH.... I wonder how many kerbals where harmed in the making of this D:
Dude... HOW

Now we need a button on the options menu that causes KSP-2 to send hostile tanks, seacraft, and airplanes after your satelites, even to the point of creating mun rovers that blast your base to shreds.

... Now we need parts that allow automatic defense against nearby flying objects.

OMGOMGOMGOMGOMGOMGOMGOmg that deserves a brofist,epic mango, with awesome sauce on top!!!!!

would it be possible to upload the ships so we can play with them?

Oh yeas !!! :-)

Im looking for the mods right now. looks interesting with vstol

Omg please release multiplayer and ability to build at multiple space ports!!

This is epic!
Haven't you been listening? No multi yet, or anytime soon.

Omg please release multiplayer and ability to build at multiple space ports!!

This is epic!

If you read the list of planned features I believe it says you will be able to build bases. Whether or not they can manufacture, I don't know, but I hope so! I am also hoping for refueling to come with docking- make really long flights easier. But then you would have to get fuel to refill the tanks in orbit, which means sending up fueling rockets, which require fuel to get up... To much effort for that? I dunno.

But I just had an epic idea. In-orbit VAB.
that was amazing great job!

Woah, this page is full of CGs. Anyways, I wish I could be half decent at bombing like in the video (Or at least make a carpet bombing plane), then I would be able to destroy useless ground debri with bombs instead of the sunbeam laser.
Very entertaining video, good job!
